title: Seared cod salad with ‘scad the beggars’, potato farls and wild garlic
description: ‘Scad the beggars’ is a Northern Irish dish of oats fried in bacon fat - used here as an alternative to croutons in this hearty salad.
ingredients: 60g/2¼oz plain flour, plus a little extra if required
melted butter or bacon fat, to serve
150g/5½oz bacon lardons, preferably cut from belly pork
4 tbsp vinaigrette (made from 2 tbsp reserved bacon fat, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp white wine vinegar, 1 tsp Dijon mustard, salt and pepper)
